Uses of Class
md.Box

  • Packages that use Box 
    Package Description
    md
    Provides the classes to manage the information of MD system (residue, segment, box).

    • Uses of Box in md

      Methods in md that return Box 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Box SystemMD.getBox()
      Returns the periodic boundary box of the system
      Box Trajectory.getBox(int n)
      Returns the box at the n-th step in the trajectory
      Box PDBReader.readBox()
      Reads the periodic box from the specified PDB file
      Methods in md with parameters of type Box 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Trajectory.addBox(Box box)
      Adds the box to the end of collection
      void MDUtil.appendBox(Box box)
      Appends a box
      void HBanalysisMD.setBox(Box box)
      Sets a periodic box used in the simulation.
      void SystemMD.setBox(Box box)
      Sets the periodic boundary box of the system
